akn:section.akn:heading: Standards of conduct for labor organizations.

akn:content.akn:p: Recognition shall be accorded only to a labor organization that is free from corrupt influences and influences opposed to basic democratic principles. A labor organization must certify to the Board that its operations mandate the following:
The Board may accept any of the following as evidence that a labor organizationâ€™s operations meet the requirements of subsection (a) of this section:
The Board shall prescribe the rules and regulations needed to effect this section. Any complaint of a violation of this section shall be filed with the Board.
